means: 预防措施( precaution的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Precautions had to be taken to prevent pilfering.
sentence.Network_cn: 必须采取防范措施阻止偷盗行为。

sentence.Network_en: You must take all reasonable precautions to protect yourself and your family.
sentence.Network_cn: 你必须采取一切合理的预防措施，保护自己和家人。

sentence.Network_en: The Danes had selfconfidence of conquerors, and their security precautions were casual.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些丹麦人具有征服者的自信, 而且他们的安全防卫也是漫不经心的.

precautions : this product can not be used to venereal disease or conduct contraception during sexual life .注重事项：本品不得佣与性生活中对性病的防备及避孕作佣。
travelers who want to see the Harbin International Ice and Snow Festival in person should take precautions .想要亲自参加哈尔滨国际冰雪节的游客需要做好防寒措施。

entry.def: A precaution is an action that is intended to prevent something dangerous or unpleasant from happening.

example.ex: Could he not, just as a precaution, move to a place of safety?...
example.tran: 就算仅仅是为了以防万一，难道他就不能挪到安全的地方吗？

example.ex: I had taken the precaution of doing a little research before I left London...
example.tran: 我已在离开伦敦前进行了准备，做了些调查研究。

auth_sentence.content: Europeans are taking precautions to survive the cold snap.
auth_sentence.res_content: Europeans are taking precautions to survive the cold snap.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Europeans are taking precautions to survive the cold snap.

auth_sentence.content: Malaria is almost completely preventable when precautions are taken.
auth_sentence.res_content: Malaria is almost completely preventable when precautions are taken.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Malaria is almost completely preventable when precautions are taken.

auth_sentence.content: Techniques and precautions were what they needed to know.
auth_sentence.res_content: Techniques and precautions were what they needed to know.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Techniques and precautions were what they needed to know.

Sentence.sentence: A few precautions can help most climbers avoid altitude sickness.
